holidays.title: National Bagel Day
holidays.description: Bagels have a history that is richer than your favorite cream cheese spread!

holidays.title: National Hat Day
holidays.description: Where do we even begin? There are so many varieties in so many different styles!

holidays.title: Alpha Kappa Alpha Day
holidays.description: Are you a female black college student looking for support? Alpha Kappa Alpha has your back.

holidays.title: Day of Sanctity and Protection of Human Life
holidays.description: Today reflects on how precious life is — no matter how short it is.

holidays.title: Indian Army Day
holidays.description: Salute the first commander-in-chief and the succeeding generals of the Indian Army today.

holidays.title: Makar Sankranti
holidays.description: Learn about this religious festival and how you can join in the festivities.

holidays.title: National Booch Day
holidays.description: Why is kombucha tea so famous? Because it has numerous properties that can improve your life.

holidays.title: National Fresh Squeezed Juice Day
holidays.description: Raid your kitchen for those neglected veggies and fruits and get juicing.

holidays.title: National Kayla Day
holidays.description: Explore the interesting history behind the name Kayla, which is also a shortened version of Michaela.

holidays.title: National Pothole Day
holidays.description: Join road users everywhere as we shed light on a real spanner in the works.

holidays.title: National Strawberry Ice Cream Day
holidays.description: Even if you’re strictly vanilla or chocolate, add some pink tartness to your ice cream today.

holidays.title: Pongal
holidays.description: Whether you have a sweet tooth or you like it spicy, there’s a Pongal for you.

holidays.title: Wikipedia Day
holidays.description: Explore the love for research by checking out some of the most famous Wikipedia pages.

holidays.title: World Religion Day
holidays.description: Our differences make us stronger, so join us in celebrating our different beliefs and cultures.

holidays.title: World Snow Day
holidays.description: ‘Enjoy, experience and explore’ —  the motto of World Snow Day, which we’re taking seriously indeed.

holidays.title: Martin Luther King’s Birthday
holidays.description: Look into the personal story of the civil right's leader, Martin Luther King.

holidays.title: Caroline Arapoglou’s Birthday
holidays.description: She married Nick Arapoglou in 2015, and they have performed many stage plays together.

holidays.title: Chicago West’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this sweet little girl, it’s all about creating childhood memories and dreams.

holidays.title: Dove Cameron’s Birthday
holidays.description: There’s no slowing down for this triple-threat actress, dancer, and singer. Bow down, Hollywood!

holidays.title: Drew Brees’s Birthday
holidays.description: There may be no more feats left to conquer for this fantastic athlete!

holidays.title: Pitbull’s Birthday
holidays.description: Pitbull has locked us in his powerful musical grip and there’s no getting out of it.

holidays.title: Regina King’s Birthday
holidays.description: More than three decades later, she continues to be one of Hollywood's most sought-after actresses.

holidays.title: Steph Toms’s Birthday
holidays.description: For Steph Toms, it’s all about connecting with her audience while doing what she loves!
